SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Modules" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_MODULES# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Scan Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_SCAN_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sandbox ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** BEGIN SCAN ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** BEGIN SCAN ACTION EXECUTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Running begin scan command ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Check on modules and scan options :SET &CHECK# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_VER_MODULES# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_VER_SCAN_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 :ENDIF
:IF &CHECK# = 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Either Modules or Scan options input must be provided." :ENDIF
:IF &CHECK# = 2 : STOP MSG, 50, "Do not select both Modules and Scan options." :ENDIF
: SET &ACTION_NAME# = "beginScan" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN
! Application ID : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -appid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Modules : IF &UC4RB_VER_MODULES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_MODULES# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -modules &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Scan Modules :IF &UC4RB_VER_SCAN_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PRV.VARA.SCAN_OPTIONS" : SET &UC4RB_ATTRIBUTE_NAME# = &UC4RB_VER_SCAN_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ITERATE_VARA : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " -&ATTRIBUTE# true") : ENDIF
! Sandbox ID : IF &UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -sandboxid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT "Command executed :: &UC4RB_CMD#"
&UC4RB_CMD#
!------------------------------------------Check error level -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
